content:
I'm thinking about suggesting adding an integration test for clippy#6079 so that we test that the lint does not emit with an actual build script.

I'm hesitating though about the correct place to put that because of the special nature of build.rs. Would it make sense to add it to clippy_workspace_tests for example so that it's catched in the dogfood tests? Does it deserve its own subproject?
FTR I went for adding it under clippy_workspace_tests
